Dialogue.text: Hmm.... I think your buddy is hungry
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Tap on your buddy to check its hunger level.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Oh deary, it sure is hungry.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: It is time to feed it!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Do you see the delicious looking icon?
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Tap on it and feed away!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text:
Your buddy looks satisfied.
 It must be happy being with you
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Remember to feed your buddy from time to time.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: You have to take care of your buddy!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally
